search.query:
| tstats summariesonly=f count from datamodel=Suricata_Suite.alerts by alerts.severity, alerts.signature, alerts.category, alerts.src_ip, alerts.src_port, alerts.dest_ip, alerts.dest_port, alerts.proto, alerts.sid, alerts.community_id, alerts.payload_printable, _time | rename alerts.severity AS severity, alerts.signature AS signature, alerts.category AS category, alerts.src_ip AS src_ip, alerts.src_port AS src_port, alerts.dest_ip AS dest_ip, alerts.dest_port AS dest_port, alerts.proto AS proto, alerts.sid AS SID, alerts.community_id AS community_id, alerts.payload_printable AS payload_printable | stats count by severity, signature, category, src_ip, src_port, dest_ip, dest_port, proto, SID, community_id, payload_printable, _time
```Filter Out Specific Alerts Here``` ```| where !like (src_ip, "1.1.1.1") AND !like (payload_printable, "NMAP")```

done.set:
| eval ExternalSouce = case( cidrmatch("10.0.0.0/8",src_ip),"False", cidrmatch("172.16.0.0/12",src_ip),"False", cidrmatch("192.168.0.0/16",src_ip),"False", isnull(src_ip) OR like(src_ip,""), "False", match(src_ip,"^((25[0-5]|(2[0-4]|1\d|[1-9]|)\d)\.?\b){4}$"),"True")
| eval ExternalDest = case( cidrmatch("10.0.0.0/8",dest_ip),"False", cidrmatch("172.16.0.0/12",dest_ip),"False", cidrmatch("192.168.0.0/16",dest_ip),"False", isnull(src_ip) OR like(dest_ip,""), "False", match(src_ip,"^((25[0-5]|(2[0-4]|1\d|[1-9]|)\d)\.?\b){4}$"),"True")

| eval severity = upper(substr(severity,1,1)).lower(substr(severity,2)) | eval sorter=severity | eval sorter=case(severity="High",1,severity="Medium",2,severity="Low",3) | sort by sorter,-count | fields - sorter

| appendpipe [| stats count | where count=0 | eval severity="No Instances Found"] | rename severity AS Severity, count AS Count, signature AS Signature, category AS Category, src_ip AS Source, dest_ip AS Destination, src_port AS "Source Port", dest_port AS "Destination Port", proto AS Protocol, community_id AS "Community ID"

| eval src_port=tonumber(src_port) | eval dest_port=tonumber(dest_port) | appendpipe [where src_port > 1024 | eval src_port = "High Port"] | appendpipe [where dest_port > 1024 | eval dest_port = "High Port"] | mvexpand src_port | mvexpand dest_port | where (src_port < tonumber(1025) OR src_port = "High Port") AND (dest_port < tonumber(1025) OR dest_port = "High Port")
| stats count by src_ip, scannertype ```Filter By Amounts Here``` ```| where count > 5``` | fields - count | mvcombine src_ip | rename src_ip AS "Scanner IP", scannertype AS "Scanner Type"
